SELECT r.review_id, r.content, r.rating, r.like_count, r.dislike_count, TO_CHAR(r.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS created_at, COALESCE(r.is_selected, '0') AS is_selected, u.user_id, u.nickname, u.baumann_id, b.type AS baumann_type, ri.image_url FROM review r JOIN USER_TABLE u ON r.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN baumann b ON u.baumann_id = b.baumann_id LEFT JOIN review_images ri ON r.review_id = ri.review_id WHERE r.product_id = #{productId} AND r.deleted_at IS NULL
ORDER BY r.created_at DESC, r.review_id DESC
ORDER BY r.rating DESC, r.created_at DESC, r.review_id DESC
ORDER BY r.like_count DESC, r.created_at DESC, r.review_id DESC
